title: Dual-Modeling Decouple Distillation for Unsupervised Anomaly Detection
details: X Liu, J Wang, B Leng, S Zhang - ACM Multimedia 2024
abstract: Knowledge distillation based on student-teacher network is one of the mainstream solution paradigms for the challenging unsupervised Anomaly Detection task, utilizing the difference in representation capabilities of the teacher and student …

title: Unifying Video Self-Supervised Learning across Families of Tasks: A Survey
details: I Dave, M Gunawardhana, L Sadith, H Zhou, L David… - 2024
abstract: Video self-supervised learning (VideoSSL) offers significant potential for reducing annotation costs and enhancing a wide range of downstream tasks in video understanding. The ultimate goal of VideoSSL is to achieve human-level video …
